name: Danger Noodle Disco
description:
Wanna play some DnD? This is a game about the glitz and excess of the 70s club scene. And also you're snakes.

Danger Noodle Disco is something to bust out when your plans have fallen through, or your group just wants to do something light and silly this week. All you need is the pdf, and some d6s, and you're ready to let the good times roll.

Danger Noodle Disco is a hack of Honey Heist, originally written by Grant Howitt.
